name: function_search_path_mutable
title: Function Search Path Mutable - FIXED
description: Previously detected functions where the search_path parameter was not set. This issue has been resolved.
detail: All functions in the public schema now have explicit search_path settings.
notes: Fixed by setting explicit search_path in all functions. See fix-search-path.sql for details.

name: auth_otp_long_expiry
title: Auth OTP long expiry - ACTION REQUIRED
description: OTP expiry exceeds recommended threshold. Manual action required.
detail: You need to manually set the email OTP expiry to 3600 seconds (1 hour) or less in the Supabase Dashboard.

name: auth_leaked_password_protection
title: Leaked Password Protection Disabled - ACTION REQUIRED
description: Leaked password protection is currently disabled. Manual action required.
detail: You need to manually enable leaked password protection in the Supabase Dashboard.
